import React, { useEffect, useRef } from 'react'; import '../assets/styles/Nav.css'; import '../assets/styles/App.css'; import DecryptedText from './extra_functions/DecryptedText'; import cv_qr from '../assets/imgs/qr-code-cv.svg'; import recycle_logo from '../assets/imgs/recycle_logo.svg'; import weee_symbol_logo from '../assets/imgs/WEEE_symbol_logo.svg'; import ce_logo from '../assets/imgs/CE_logo.svg'; const About = ({ setAboutSection }) => { const section1Ref = useRef(null); const section2Ref = useRef(null); const section3Ref = useRef(null); useEffect(() => { const sectionsContainer = document.querySelector('.about__sections__container'); const handleScroll = () => { const scrollPosition = sectionsContainer.scrollTop; const windowHeight = window.innerHeight; if (scrollPosition < windowHeight * 0.5) { setAboutSection(1); } else if (scrollPosition < windowHeight * 1.5) { setAboutSection(2); } else { setAboutSection(3); } }; sectionsContainer.addEventListener('scroll', handleScroll); return () => sectionsContainer.removeEventListener('scroll', handleScroll); }, [setAboutSection]); return (
{/* Sección 1 */}
